greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generalized Catalan numbers C(-4; n).
comment: See triangle A064334 with columns m built from C(-m; n), m >= 0, also for Derrida et al. references.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..830
formula: G.f.: (1+4*x*c(-4*x)/5)/(1-x/5) = 1/(1-x*c(-4*x)) with c(x) g.f. of Catalan numbers A000108.
a(n) = hypergeometric([1-n, n], [-n], -4) for n > 0. - _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
program: [a(n) for n in range(20)] # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 21 2001
